1.name: To-Do List
1.description: Create and manage daily tasks with priority levels and completion tracking.

2.name: Calendar
2.description: View and schedule events, set reminders, and organize your schedule by day, week, or month.

3.name: Notes
3.description: Write, organize, and store notes with tags and search functionality for quick retrieval.

4.name: Goals
4.description: Set long-term and short-term goals, track progress, and celebrate milestones.

5.name: Habit Tracker
5.description: Build positive habits by logging daily activities and visualizing your consistency streaks.

6.name: Spotify
6.description: Connect your Spotify account to view listening stats, top tracks, and discover new music recommendations.
